00021 #include "AuditFileWriter.h"

00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_array;
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00028 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_parameter;
00029 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;

00046 /*
00047  * Write the entry members in a tag=value style. Enclose the entry in a #Entry tag.
00048  */
00049 bool AuditFileWriter::Write(const std::string &fileName, affymetrix_calvin_array::ArrayAuditEntry &auditData)
00050 {
00051         ofstream auditFile(fileName.c_str(), ios::out | ios::app);
00052         if (!auditFile)
00053                 return false;
00054 
00055         auditFile << AUDIT_START_TAG << endl;
00056         auditFile << AUDIT_USER_TAG << "=" << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(auditData.UserName()) << endl;
00057         auditFile << AUDIT_DATE_TAG << "=" << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(auditData.DateTime().Date()) << endl;
00058         auditFile << AUDIT_TIME_TAG << "=" << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(auditData.DateTime().Time()) << endl;
00059         auditFile << AUDIT_ACTION_TAG << "=" << auditData.ActionType() << endl;
00060         auditFile << AUDIT_ARRAY_ID_TAG << "=" << auditData.ArrayGuid() << endl;
00061 
00062         for (AffymetrixGuidTypeList::iterator it = auditData.InputFileGuids().begin();
00063                 it != auditData.InputFileGuids().end(); ++it)
00064         {
00065                 AffymetrixGuidType guid = (*it);
00066                 auditFile << AUDIT_INPUT_ID_TAG << "=" << guid << endl;
00067         }
00068 
00069         for (AffymetrixGuidTypeList::iterator it = auditData.OutputFileGuids().begin();
00070                 it != auditData.OutputFileGuids().end(); ++it)
00071         {
00072                 AffymetrixGuidType guid = (*it);
00073                 auditFile << AUDIT_OUTPUT_ID_TAG << "=" << guid << endl;
00074         }
00075 
00076         for (ParameterNameValuePairList::iterator it = auditData.ActionParameters().begin();
00077                 it != auditData.ActionParameters().end(); ++it)
00078         {
00079                 ParameterNameValuePair param = (*it);
00080                 auditFile << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.Name) << "=" << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.Value) << endl;
00081         }
00082 
00083         auditFile << AUDIT_END_TAG << endl;
00084         auditFile.close();
00085 
00086         return (auditFile.fail() == 0);
00087 }
